function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","Impact":"Misunderstanding of risks and unrealistic demands from the public, leading to ineffective risk governance","Mitigation":"Develop clear and accessible communication strategies, address public concerns promptly, and provide accurate information","Technologies":"Communication technologies, data visualization tools, and social media platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Government communication officials"},{"Description":"Challenges in deciding what information to disclose to the public","Impact":"Possible unjustified fear among members of the public due to complete transparency","Mitigation":"Implement a carefully curated information disclosure strategy, prioritize relevant and accurate information, and provide context to mitigate potential misunderstandings","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, risk assessment models, and public engagement platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Government communication officials"}]}
